snippet: Novartis’s drug, Zarxio, contains the same active ingredient as Amgen’s Neupogen, and once released would become the first biosimilar in the United States.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Richard Seeborg denies Amgen's attempt to block sale of Novartis's recently approved biosimilar form of Neupogen, used to prevent infections in cancer patients.
lead_paragraph: Novartis’s drug, Zarxio, contains the same active ingredient as Amgen’s Neupogen, and once released would become the first biosimilar in the United States.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Bid by Amgen to Block Biosimilar Drug by Novartis
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Amgen Loses Bid to Block Biosimilar Drug by Novartis
